feed.title: Category: let's get this baby off the ground | andrewdotnich

entry.title: Customary apology for lack of posts
entry.content:
I've not really posted for a while; I guess this isn't exactly the most exciting thing I try and do. Life is too full of interacting with people so I keep forgetting to come here and gush whatever's on my mind. But whatever. Maybe more this year. Maybe.

Comments

Stephen McDonald
If I might gush, the new layout is looking good.

entry.title: New year, new blog
entry.content:
…So last year's effort to blog properly didn't really work very well. That's ok, more learning curve. I'm hoping that having everything hosted and managed for me will make it easier for me to just write, and ignore all the fiddle.

We'll see how it goes…


(Image: fraumorgenstern on flickr)

Comments

&y
Was going to ask you which one that was – there seem to be a few around, of varying usefulness. Same applies to your flickr feed box. Maybe you can let me know which ones they are offline?
Stephen McDonald
Good to see you in this corner of the tubes! I look forward to more.

The twitter syndication ad-on is a useful way to keep things from getting stagnant.
